Setting permissions to create a print form from the object profile
The ability to generate a printed form from an object type profile may be limited for a user/user groups.
This restriction requires
permission settings
for (settings are made as part of the System permissions adjustment, see
Configuring System permissions
):
Print form template
(see
Creating a print form template
) and
Relation of a print form template to the object type
.
To configure permissions to the print form template, you need to:
1. In the menu, select Administration→ Access to System objects.
2. In the
Child object types
field, select
Print form template
.
3. Select the
print form
that you want to access.
4. Select a user/a group of users by clicking
.
5.
Allow/restrict
actions by setting the markers in the columns:
read
write
delete
6.
Save
the print form template access settings by clicking
.
Setting up permissions to the relation of the print form template is similar, you need to:
1. In the menu, select Administration→ Access to System objects.
2. In the "Object type" field, select
Print form template relation to the object type
.
3. Select the
object
that you want to access.
4. Select a user/a group of users by clicking
.
5.
Allow/restrict
actions by setting the markers in the columns:
read
write
delete
6.
Save
the print form template access settings by clicking
.
Access to the print form of the object type is configured for the selected user/group of users.
By default, the settings are made for the same users/user groups.
In the case of configuring the Print form template and its relations to multiple object types the access must be set
for all objects in the System
.
